# The `apf_pred_ty` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This helper class is used to match scalar and vector constants that satisfy a specified predicate, and bind them to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This helper class is used to match scalar and vector constants that satisfy a specified predicate, and bind them to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a>.

Poison is allowed in splat vector constants.

Definition at line 440 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/patternmatch-h">PatternMatch.h</a>.
